            About me
            I am a highly motivated and results-driven Marketing Data
            Analyst with one year of professional experience. Passionate
            about leveraging data to drive strategic marketing
            decisions, I have honed my skills in various tools and
            technologies, including Python, R Studio, Databricks, SQL,
            and Microsoft Azure.
            As a Marketing Data Analyst, I excel at analyzing large
            datasets, extracting valuable insights, and translating them
            into actionable recommendations. My proficiency in Python
            allows me to develop efficient data pipelines, automate data
            cleaning and transformation processes, and conduct advanced
            statistical analyses. With R Studio, I have leveraged my
            analytical skills to build predictive models and perform
            data visualization tasks to effectively communicate complex
            findings.
            If you are looking for a Data Analyst who combines
            technical expertise with a strong business acumen, please
            don’t hesitate to reach out. I am eager to contribute my
            skills and experience to help your organization achieve its
            strategic marketing goals.
            Additionally, I also post my personal project as well as
            visualizations that I have created in the Projects and Tidy
            Tuesday section. Check it out!
            
            
            Education
            Macalester College | Saint Paul, MN
            Data Science Major, Computer Science Minor | September
            2018 - May 2022
            Magna Cum Laude | 3.90 / 4.00 GPA.
            
            
            Work Experience
            In4mation Insights | Marketing Analyst |
            July 2022 - Present
            VietSeeds Foundation | Quantitative
            Analyst Intern | March 2021 - August 2021
            BENIT | Data Analyst Intern | January
            2021 – April 2021

articles.title: R Project
articles.contents:
Here is some of my project using R. I would love to hear if you found them helpful. Or, if there’s a mistake you find or a suggestion you have, I’d love to hear about those, too.
S&P 500 Profit Prediction
For this project, we try to predict the profitability of the S&P500 Companies and pick the company with the highest chance to generate profit. So far, in 2021, our top 20 companies have the profitability of 47.25%, which is far higher than the normal S&P 500’s profit of 23.07%.
You can check it out here
Moreover, if you want to see the powerpoint presentation for the project, I also included it below here
Bayesian Finance
For this project, we try a different method: using Bayesian Technique to predict the earnings of S&P 500 Companies. How will the project turn out? You can check it out here
Exploration of Rayshader
This project focuses on discovering rayshader features (the 3D Mapping technique in R).
What is Rayshader? rayshader is an open source package for producing 2D and 3D data visualizations in R. rayshader uses elevation data in a base R matrix and a combination of raytracing, spherical texture mapping, overlays, and ambient occlusion to generate beautiful topographic 2D and 3D maps. In addition to maps, rayshader also allows the user to translate ggplot2 objects into beautiful 3D data visualizations.
In this project, we will see different feautures of rayshader, how to combine that with ggplot2 as well as a cool dataset for you to explore!
Here is the link to the website
Change in Stock market before and After the Pandemic
This project focuses on finding the differences between different companies within the top 3 of every sector in the S&P 500 to see which company thrives and which company falls after the pandemic. We track its market cap, volume, price per share to see the key differences between these 11 fields.
Here is the link to the website

articles.title: Work Experience
articles.contents:
Below is the snapshot of my internship and work experience so far:
In4mation Insights | Marketing Analyst | July 2022 - Present
BENIT | Data Analyst Intern | March 2021- August 2021
VietSeeds Foundation | Quantitative Analyst Intern | January 2021 – April 2021
Morgan Stanley | Investment Banking Intern | November 2019 – January 2020
CMC Telecom | Big Data Intern | May 2018 – August 2018
Additionally, during my four years at Macalester, I have achieved a few data science awards. I have been awarded First Prize - Best in Show and Best Insights during DataFest 2022. If you are interested, here is
the link
to the article. I am also the #1 Public Leaderboard on Tabular Playground Series – May 2021.
For more detailed information, feel free to see my full resume.
